div.p: This IG covers data and bundle Security Labelstagging. This is not sufficient to assure Security and Privacy. The data in scope for this IG are Patient Sensitive. This IG must be used in combination with a Privacy and Security framework that assures organization, system, and communication management of Security and Privacy risks. This is inclusive but not excluded to Communications, Authentication, Authorization, Privacy Consent, Audit Logging, Provenance, etc.
